text_block_list.text: Hmm… Hmmm… Ohh, what should I do?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Hey, who's that? Do they need help? I'm gonna go see if I can lend a 
hand!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Oh, Kitasan? 
…Dang, she's pretty light on her feet.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Hehe. That's Kita for you. Ever since we were young, she's never been 
able to turn away from someone in trouble.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Since you were young? Oh, so you guys are childhood friends, huh? In 
that case, you're both sure to grow by leaps and bounds.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Hm? Uh, thank you…

Ahhh, the pork cutlet curry has way too many calories… But I just can't 
resist that crispy, fluffy goodness…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
If you want to eat it so badly, why hold back? The extra calories will 
give you more energy for training!

That's a great point! I think I'll go with the curry so I can work even 
harder!

I always have trouble making up my mind, so I appreciate the push! 
Umm…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Oh! I'm Kitasan Black! I'm new here to the academy!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'm Matikanetannhauser! Thanks again, Kita!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku and Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Tanny-in-the-Hauserrr! 
Machitaaaan!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Wahhh! You scared me!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Whatcha got there? Pork cutlet curry? Hmm… The brown vibe works, 
but how 'bout adding a tomato salad for a splash of color?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Oh, tomato! Yeah, making it more colorful would definitely up the 
flavor!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Check this! I'm gonna add even more colors! Ketchup! Mayo! Mustard! Fish eggs! …Grapes!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Uh-huh, uh-huh… Huh?! That sounds gross!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Don't hate—let her cook! Why not go all in and make it an 
Umasta-worthy rainbow curry?!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Rainbow curry?! C-careful not to overdo it, now…

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Hey, Kita… There's something almost soothing about that Tannhauser 
girl, don't you think?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
I was just thinking the same thing! Guess there are people like her 
here at Tracen Academy too.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Btdubs, now that Tannhauser's here, how about we kick off the grand finale? I was hoping you could do me a solid, Turbo… Mutter, mutter, mutter…

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Ooh, yeah! That sounds awesome! Gimme a sec to get set up, 'kay?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: I've got a bad feeling about this…

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Yo, yo! What's up guuuys! ☆ Who's ready to P-A-R-T-Y? B-b-boom!

text_block_list.name: Everyone
text_block_list.text: Yeaaah!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Wh-what the heck is this?!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: It appears to be a DJ kit. When did they set it up?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Make some noise for Kita and Sato! DJ Helios here, ready to turn up 
and lay down some sick beats! Hit it, Turbo! ☆

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Aye aye, sir! Time to start the music! Clickety-poke!
BOOM! ♪ BOOM! ♪

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Waaaaagh! Yo, Turbo! That's way too loud! I know I said to "turn up," 
but still…

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Urgh…

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: She's down?! S-somebody stop the music!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: That's easier said than done!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: We'll burst our eardrums if we get any closer!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
This is bad! If we don't do something quick, you-know-who is gonna 
notice…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Eek! Palmer, look behind you!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Huh? …Oh.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Okay, it's way cleaner now! Let's take a break, everyone! Nice work!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
You know it! We make one heck of a team! Wanna form a squad? We 
can be "The Super Trash Troopers ☆" or something! Woohoo!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
Considering we'll be participating in a wide range of student 
council-organized activities, I think a more appropriate name would 
be "The Community Service Squad ☆."

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Kitasan, Satono—sorry for getting you guys mixed up in all this. But I 
gotta say, I'm impressed. You two've got some skills.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
You think so? Well, I guess we're used to it. I used to do volunteer 
work like this all the time with Dia's family!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Oh yeah? Your family has a passion for that kind of thing, Satono?

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Yes. I actually first met Kita while volunteering. It feels so long ago 
now. By the way, will you all be okay? Don't you have races?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, but they've organized our schedule to keep this community 
service from interfering with our training, so we'll manage. Hehe.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan and Satono
text_block_list.text: So carefree…

text_block_list.name: Umamusume's Journal
text_block_list.text:
"My to-do list keeps growing day by day. But it's a lot of fun. From 
now on, I'm going to get up early and go running every morning! 
…Unless I snooze too long."
